pages.text: ❶FullBrightnessToggle: Press 'G' to enable fullbright.$(br)❷Camera: Take or upload pictures, display them on an image frame. Shift-right-click with the camera to select a filter.$(br)❸Inventory sorter: Middle click in a chest or your inventory to sort it.$(br)❹Dice: Roll a die in 16 colors.
